** 7 應帝王第七

有虞氏，¶

肩吾曰：¶
「告我
君人者以己出	KR2c0021_083:56b:4:21:1,KR5c0051_003:31a:2:7:5,KR5c0126_007:1a:23:3:2,KR5c0127_019:006a:4:6:19,KR5c0128_010:002a:9:6:2,KR5c0134_002:016b:1:6:15,KR5c0135_008:002a:2:7:3,KR5c0136_006:021a:1:6:23,KR5c0139_009:003b:8:6:6,KR5h0057_002:069b:3:6:4

# dating: 8110

如是者，¶

壺子曰：¶
「鄉吾示之以天壤，¶	KR5c0126_007:1a:130:1:17,KR5c0138_000:2b:6:2:28,KR5c0138_003:22b:5:18:2,KR5i0036_002:02p074b:1:10:26

壺子曰：¶
「鄉吾示之以太沖莫勝。¶	KR5c0126_007:1a:145:1:19,KR5c0138_000:2b:8:17:30
是殆見吾衡氣機也。¶	KR4d0077_013:21a:7:28:39,KR4d0077_025:24b:6:15:38,KR4d0078_014:11a:4:16:40,KR4d0080_034:23a:8:21:66,KR4d0086_009:31a:11:12:58,KR4d0180_010:19b:1:25:16,KR4d0389_007:3b:2:18:7,KR5c0051_003:36b:2:50:5,KR5c0126_007:1a:146:1:19,KR5c0127_020:006b:6:11:19,KR5c0128_010:009a:6:4:2,KR5c0134_002:017b:9:6:18,KR5c0136_006:025a:4:14:27,KR5c0138_003:23a:3:18:2,KR5c0139_009:016a:9:1:18,KR5h0057_002:073a:8:8:4,KR5i0036_002:02p074b:6:11:26,KR6q0235_002:0161b:15:18:53,KR6s0075_004:0451a:4:17:57

# src: ZHUANG 7.5.12 Guo Qingfan 306; Wang Shumin 300; Fang Yong 220; Chen Guying 221
# dating: 8110
然後列子自以為未始學	KR2c0021_112:9a:4:9:1,KR3k0058_107:2b:3:3:2,KR5c0124_002:13a:100:1:73,KR5c0125_002:18a:6:10:4,KR5c0126_007:1a:171:1:23,KR5c0138_003:23b:8:4:2,KR6q0219_001:0036b:29:1:415,KR6s0075_004:0451b:4:22:57
而歸，¶

无為名尸，¶	KR5c0126_007:1a:180:1:24
